column5: Any truth to the rumour that mm is desperately searching his house for all of his Canadian Tire money so he can buy seasons tickets?
that would be a poor investment
Lmao.....too funny !  This sure will be the focus of some jokes for a while. of all the building sponsors they had to pick crappy tire....lol
Hey...I heard a few people on this board may work for them....  Maybe it's just a rumour....LOL
Nice.... The Crappy Tire Centre.Melnyk setting himself up good for lots appy sens jokes. But at 1.3 mill a year I'm sure he can live with that.
